name: Baldi's Basics 1.3.1 Mod Menu
description:
This is Baldi's Basics v1.3.1 but with Mod Menu! But this doesn't have a  lot of features. It only has the following:

  • Baldi Ignores Player
  • Playtime Ignores Player
  • Principal of the Thing ignores Player
  • Gotta Sweep Ignores Player
  • Arts And Crafters Ignores Player
  • 1st-Prize Ignores Player
  • "42"
  • Noclip
  • Enable Full 3D Camera Movement
  • Infinite Stamina
  • Entity GPS

Hope You still enjoy it!
